title: Texas Anti-Abortion Crusader Demands Abortion Patient Information In Court
description:
The lawyer behind Texas's bounty hunter abortion ban is retaliating against people who get abortions and those who help them.

The post Texas Anti-Abortion Crusader Demands Abortion Patient Information In Court appeared first on The Intercept.

title: Sen. Josh Hawley Received Campaign Donations From General Motors and Ford
description:
The senator, who joined striking UAW workers on the picket line this week, no longer accepts money from corporate PACs.

The post Sen. Josh Hawley Received Campaign Donations From General Motors and Ford appeared first on The Intercept.
